comment: has primitive schema types such as boolean, date, dateTime, double, duration, float, integer, long, string, and time
description: to create a digital twin with primitive schema

contents.comment: a primitive date in ISO 8601 format follows the pattern yyyy-mm-dd
contents.name: dateProperty

contents.comment: a primitive dateTime in ISO 8601 format follows the pattern yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ss
contents.name: dateTimeProperty

contents.comment: a primitive double in IEEE 754 double-precision floating point format range from ±5.0 × 10^−324 to ±1.8 × 10^308
contents.name: doubleProperty

contents.comment: a primitive duration in ISO 8601 format follows the pattern PnYnMnDTnHnMnS
contents.name: durationProperty

contents.comment: a primitive float in IEEE 754 single-precision floating point format range from ±1.4 × 10^−45 to ±3.4 × 10^38
contents.name: floatProperty

contents.comment: a primitive signed integeral numeric value in 4 bytes range from -2,147,483,648 to 2,147,483,647
contents.name: integerProperty

contents.comment: a primitive signed integeral numeric value in 8 bytes range from -9,223,372,036,854,775,808 to 9,223,372,036,854,775,807
contents.name: longProperty

contents.comment: a primitive string in UTF-8 format
contents.name: stringProperty

contents.comment: a primitive time in ISO 8601 format follows the pattern hh:mm:ss
contents.name: timeProperty
